alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains; Spokane Area; Upper Columbia Basin (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 21 at 4:41PM PST until December 22 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Davenport, Grand Coulee, Metaline Falls, Spokane Valley, Northport, Metaline, Tiger, Kettle Falls, Cheney, Newport, Flowery Trail Road, Colville, Downtown Spokane, Wilbur, Orin-Rice Road, Harrington, Fruitland, Coulee City, Airway Heights, Rockford, Ritzville, Deer Park, Odessa, Springdale-Hunters Road, Fairfield, Creston, Chewelah, and Ione. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Spotters have reported visibility lower than 1/8 of a mile along I-90 near Ritzville. Motorists should be prepared for rapidly changing visibilities.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Mountains; Spokane Area; Upper Columbia Basin
